abstract: Federal court deals significant blow to for-profit college industry by ruling that Education Dept is within its rights to put in place stringent regulations governing career training programs.
lead_paragraph: A federal court has ruled in favor of tough new regulations aimed at career training programs, dealing a major blow to the for-profit college industry.

headline.main: Court Upholds Rules to Curb Loan Fraud by Colleges
headline.print_headline: Court Upholds Rules to Curb Loan Fraud by Colleges

snippet: A federal court has ruled in favor of tough new regulations aimed at career training programs, dealing a major blow to the for-profit college industry.
